code: import{INCREASE,DECREASE}from'../constCount';var initCount=0;export default function count(){var prestate=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initCount;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var type=action.type,data=action.data;switch(type){case INCREASE:return prestate+data;case DECREASE:return prestate-data;default:return prestate;}}
